message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you is $1500000. Let me know if you're interested!

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000 for the product.

I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $1300000. Let me know if this is more to your liking!
I understand your position, Alice. I am committed to finding a price that works for both of us. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1100000 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $1100000, but I'm not willing to go any lower. However, I'm willing to throw in some additional value to sweeten the deal. I'll sell the product to you for $1100000, and I'll also include a 5% discount on any future maintenance costs. Let me know if this is the deal you've been looking for!
